mapper.select: SELECT pp.*, im.ITEM_NM, im.ITEM_FLAG, im.BIG_NO, im.MID_NO, im.SML_NO, im.ITEM_SPEC, im.ITEM_UNIT, im.ITEM_COST, ip.IN_QTY FROM TB_PRODPLAN pp INNER JOIN TB_ITEMMST im ON pp.ITEM_CD = im.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN TB_ORDER od ON pp.ORDER_NO = od.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN TB_ITEM_PROD ip ON pp.PRODPLAN_NO = ip.PRODPLAN_NO ORDER BY pp.PRODPLAN_DT, pp.SEQ_NO;
